meanings.sent1: During the meeting, Sarah yacked about her weekend nonstop.
meanings.sent2: The students yacked excitedly about the upcoming school trip.
meanings.sent3: Tom yacked so much that he didn't even notice the time passing.
meanings.sent4: Her words yacked like a waterfall, never stopping for a breath.
meanings.sent5: The toddler yacked on and on about his favorite toy, driving his parents crazy.

meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he yacked all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: She felt queasy and knew she was going to yack any moment.
meanings.sent3: The roller coaster ride made him yack his lunch right after getting off.
meanings.sent4: The terrible smell made her yack instantly.
meanings.sent5: The spoiled milk made him yack uncontrollably, creating a mess in the kitchen.
